MiniDplyr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Select variables

Source: R/select.R

This function allows to select variables from a data frame

select2(x, ind)

Arguments

x

A data frame.
ind

Either

  • a character vector of variable names

  • an integer vector of variables positions

  • a boolean vector of variables to keep

Value

A data frame constituted by all the rows of x and only the columns specified in ind.

Examples

select2(iris, c("Petal.Width", "Species"))
#>     Petal.Width    Species
#> 1           0.2     setosa
#> 2           0.2     setosa
